relating to monetarism (= the belief that a country's economy should be controlled by limiting the amount of money in use): monetarist policies This government is committed to a monetarist economic strategy.
More examplesFewer examplesShe was investigating the value of a monetarist economic policy.monetarist economicsYou might ask whether the monetarist approach is the right way to go.
